name: azure-agents-cli
description: A lightweight CLI for Microsoft Foundry Agent Service.   Now updated to Support for [Foundry Agent Service v2](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/agents/overview?view=foundry) as well as [v1 (Classic)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/agents/overview?view=foundry-classic)
